name: Collect them: Hurry Up !
description:
Collect Them : Hurry Up is a puzzle and action game inspired by the mobile game "Snake". 

In this game you play a green square. You goal is to collect every white sphere on the screen. However be carefull, any blue or green objects will kill you just by passing on them !
In addition to this, once you have press a directional key, you can't stop or slow your character. Pressing a touch speed up your character every seconds.

Inputs : Directional Keys
